vom_tag.name: Vom Tag (From the Roof)
vom_tag.description: A high guard that favors powerful downward strikes and aggressive pressure.

half_sword.name: Half-Swording
half_sword.description: A close-range grappling stance allowing precise thrusts and strong defensive control.

wrath_guard.name: Wrath Guard
wrath_guard.description: A balanced stance ready to shift into attack or defense quickly.

ochs.name: Ochs (Ox)
ochs.description: High guard with point forward at head height, simulating ox horns, good for thrusts from above.

pflug.name: Pflug (Plow)
pflug.description: Low guard at hip height, point forward, mimicking a plow, strong for thrusts and parries.

alber.name: Alber (Fool)
alber.description: Deceptive low guard with point down, provoking attacks to counter swiftly.

porta_di_ferro.name: Porta di Ferro (Iron Door)
porta_di_ferro.description: Strong low guard close to the ground, ideal for awaiting and breaking attacks.

posta_di_donna.name: Posta di Donna (Woman’s Guard)
posta_di_donna.description: High guard above shoulder, breaks other guards with powerful strikes.

posta_di_fenestra.name: Posta di Fenestra (Window Guard)
posta_di_fenestra.description: Deceptive high guard, quick for covers, strikes, and transitions.

dente_di_zenghiaro.name: Dente di Zenghiaro (Boar’s Tooth)
dente_di_zenghiaro.description: Low guard mimicking boar’s tusk, strong for underhand thrusts.

vom_tag.name: Vom Tag (From the Roof)
vom_tag.description: High guard for powerful downward strikes.

guardia_alta.name: Guardia Alta (High Guard)
guardia_alta.description: High guard for downward cuts and thrusts.

porta_di_ferro.name: Porta di Ferro (Iron Gate)
porta_di_ferro.description: Low guard strong against incoming attacks.

guardia_di_testa.name: Guardia di Testa (Head Guard)
guardia_di_testa.description: Protects the head, ready for counters.
